SELECT e.*, ( SELECT count(a.asset_id) FROM eam_gateway_test_asset a WHERE e.gateway_id = a.gateway_id ) assetCount , (SELECT Round(sum(b.cost)/10000,2) FROM eam_gateway_test_asset a LEFT JOIN eam_asset b ON a.asset_id = b.asset_id WHERE e.gateway_id = a.gateway_id) cost, (SELECT Round(sum(b.netQuota)/10000,2) FROM eam_gateway_test_asset a LEFT JOIN eam_asset b ON a.asset_id = b.asset_id WHERE e.gateway_id = a.gateway_id) netQuota FROM eam_gateway_test e WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( e.gateway_id LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR e.address LIKE '%${keyword}%' ) union SELECT eg.*, ( SELECT Round(sum(b.cost)/10000,2) FROM eam_gateway_test_asset a WHERE eg.gateway_id = a.gateway_id ) assetCount , (SELECT sum(b.cost) FROM eam_gateway_test_asset a LEFT JOIN eam_asset b ON a.asset_id = b.asset_id WHERE eg.gateway_id = a.gateway_id) cost, (SELECT Round(sum(b.netQuota)/10000,2) FROM eam_gateway_test_asset a LEFT JOIN eam_asset b ON a.asset_id = b.asset_id WHERE eg.gateway_id = a.gateway_id) netQuota FROM eam_asset ea LEFT JOIN eam_gateway_test_asset ega ON ea.asset_id = ega.asset_id LEFT JOIN eam_gateway_test eg ON ega.gateway_id = eg.gateway_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND eg.gateway_id IS NOT NULL AND ( ea.asset_num LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR ea.asset_name LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR ea.iot_num LIKE '%${keyword}%' ) GROUP BY eg.id
